thread.title: Watch Hamilton's Schuyler Sisters Completely Crush "America the Beautiful" at the Super Bowl - Schuyler Sisters Sing "America the Beautiful" at the Super Bowl
thread.title_full: Watch Hamilton's Schuyler Sisters Completely Crush "America the Beautiful" at the Super Bowl - Schuyler Sisters Sing "America the Beautiful" at the Super Bowl

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Watch Hamilton's Schuyler Sisters Completely Crush "America the Beautiful" at the Super Bowl - Schuyler Sisters Sing "America the Beautiful" at the Super Bowl

organizations.name: watch hamilton's schuyler sisters completely crush

text:
While most fans might be looking forward to Lady Gaga's halftime show or Luke Bryan's rendition of the National Anthem, three members of the Hamilton cast just set the bar high for the evening. Renee Elise Goldberry, Phillipa Soo and Jasmne Cephas Jones, who play the harmonizing Schuyler sisters from the hit Broadway musical, kicked off the evening with an epic cover of "America the Beautiful" on the field. The performance was short but sweet, but it was clever, too―after singing the lyric, "And crowned thy good with brotherhood," they quickly added in "and sisterhood."
 Watch the performance—harmonies, high belts and all—below.
. @HamiltonMusical 's Schuyler Sisters knock it out of the park before the #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/PaIDezZRQk
— Mashable (@mashable) February 5, 2017
